blogPost.excerpt: Wavvy is a podcast hosting and analytics platform that is free and open source. Get an RSS feed for iTunes/Spotify, an embeddable audio player, basic analytics, and a customizable one page website. code: https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean
blogPost.body: Wavvy is a podcast hosting and analytics platform that is free and open source. Get an RSS feed for iTunes/Spotify, an embeddable audio player, basic analytics, and a customizable one page website. code: https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean
blogPost.title: Wavvy - Podcast hosting and analytics
blogPost.author: Tosh

localize.description: Wavvy是一个免费和开源的播客托管和分析平台。获得一个iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一个可嵌入的音频播放器，基本的分析，以及一个可定制的单页网站。代码：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。
Wavvy是一個免費和開源的播客託管和分析平臺。獲得一個iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一個可嵌入的音頻播放器，基本的分析，以及一個可定製的單頁網站。代碼：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。

previous.excerpt: The biggest update yet, Diagrams 2.0 Macaw, brings full optimization for macOS Big Sur and the new M1 Macs, along with many new features like palette presets, customizable palettes, and new styling options.
previous.title: Diagrams 2.0 - A major update to your diagramming experience on Mac

localize.description: 迄今为止最大的更新--Diagrams 2.0 Macaw，带来了针对macOS Big Sur和新M1 Mac的全面优化，以及许多新功能，如调色板预设、可自定义调色板和新的造型选项。
localize.tagline: Mac上的图表绘制体验的重大更新。

localize.description: 迄今爲止最大的更新--Diagrams 2.0 Macaw，帶來了針對macOS Big Sur和新M1 Mac的全面優化，以及許多新功能，如調色板預設、可自定義調色板和新的造型選項。
localize.tagline: Mac上的圖表繪製體驗的重大更新。
